definition.name: tributors-action
definition.description: Update your contributor metadata files with repository members
definition.author: Vanessa Sochat

inputs.name: parsers
inputs.description: space separated list of parsers to use. Defaults to unset (auto-detect)

inputs.name: update_lookup
inputs.description: before running update, update the .tributors metadata file from these resources

inputs.name: skip_users
inputs.description: one or more GitHub logins (space separated) to skip.

inputs.name: zenodo_file
inputs.description: .zenodo.json to update. If does not exist, must define doi variable

inputs.name: zenodo_doi
inputs.description: Zenodo DOI needed for init. Leave unset to skip init.

inputs.name: threshold
inputs.description: the minimum number of contributions required to add a user

inputs.name: mailmap_file
inputs.description: A mailmap file for update-lookup (defaults to .mailmap)

inputs.name: allcontrib_type
inputs.description: All Contributors contribution type, which defaults to code if not set.

inputs.name: run_twice
inputs.description: run twice to avoid opening two pull requests (defaults to true)

evidence.reasoning: The action is focused on updating contributor metadata files, which relates to documentation and maintaining code quality by ensuring accurate contributor information.
